trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGME109_04940_SEQ_00<tab>Otis is pleased with the meat you have brought him.

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_SEQ_01<tab>Having taken receipt of your meat, Otis next asks you to procure kindling electrope. To that end, you head over to the houses nearby to gather pieces of electrope, some of which should be the variety you require.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_SEQ_02<tab>After a rummage through the ruins, you manage to gather a decent amount of electrope pieces. As per Otis's instructions, you bear them to Gulool Ja for identification.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_SEQ_03<tab>As you watch on, Gulool Ja examines the electrope pieces and soon identifies the one you require. Having duly finished your task, you go to report to Otis.

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_SEQ_04<tab>With the preparations complete, Otis cooks up the promised repast and serves it up for all to enjoy. As you relax afterwards, your bellies full of delicious stew, Wuk Lamat has a candid conversation with Gulool Ja and tells him what it means to be family. At Alisaie's urging, Otis then shares with you his tale. Centuries ago, before lightning had changed the world, he was an ordinary man who served as a knight of Alexandria. When the great calamity struck, the king and queen passed away, and their only daughter the princess was taken by illness not long after ascending the throne. Through the power of electrope, however, her soul and memories were preserved, and she was spared eternal death. This procedure was made possible by none other than Otis, who volunteered as a test subject, resulting in his transformation into the machine he is now. Those that are thus recreated from the memories of the departed are known as the Endless, and to everyone's shock, it is revealed that Sphene was the first of them─the queen who was brought back to life.

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_SEQ_05<tab>As you and your companions struggle to process the revelation of Sphene's true nature, questions arise over whether Cahciua and her people had been aware of this fact. For all that you have learned, it seems there is still much and more that you do not know...
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_TODO_00<tab>Gather pieces of processed electrope.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the pieces of processed electrope to Gulool Ja.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Otis.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>You haven't finished yet, right? That would be too fast, even for you!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_001<tab>Once Alisaie brings her portion, we shall have a glorious bounty to satisfy growing younglings like yourselves!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_002<tab>Indeed, I expect there will be ample leftovers to share with the good folk of the driftdowns. They always appreciate a warm meal.

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_003<tab>Now, seeing as you have completed your task so quickly, I have another request to make of you. We've exhausted our supplies of kindling electrope, and I should be grateful if you could search the houses yonder for more.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_004<tab>In the old kingdom, electrope rations were issued to each citizen. While small, fragments may still be found here and there.

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_005<tab>If you can obtain five pieces, say, at least one ought to be what we require─that is, the kind that converts lightning to fire. Gulool Ja can identify them by their circuitry, so pray take them to him.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_006<tab>The boy has become quite deft at discerning electrope types, and in a very short time, I might add. Now, off you go, and happy foraging!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_010<tab>Of late, my arms and legs have grown somewhat creaky and uncooperative. A few centuries will do that even to the best of us, I suppose! Hahaha!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_020<tab>The others have returned as well. What a blessedly lively day this has become!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_021<tab>We've got the requested vegetables, along with a few extra bits! I have to say, all this running around's made me hungry...
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_022<tab>Hmph, I dared to think I had won this time, but it turns out you were already off doing another task.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_030<tab>Otis says you have electrope for me?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_031<tab>Wow, you found a lot!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_032<tab>Let's see... This one creates wind, this one is for water...
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_033<tab>You can tell just like that? I'm impressed.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_034<tab>Clever, isn't he? I'll bet he gets it from his father...
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_035<tab>Ah, this is it! This converts to fire!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_036<tab>It's absorbed lots of lightning, so we should be able to kindle a flame easily.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_037<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_040<tab>Hehe... It makes me happy to see Gulool Ja happy.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_041<tab>Wuk Lamat could carry lots of vegetables at once. She's really strong!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_042<tab>With apologies to Erenville and Krile, let's enjoy the meal!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_045<tab>Thanks to your kind assistance, we have everything we need for our repast.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_046<tab>You have done your part, and now I shall do mine. I bid you relax, my friends─the meal will soon be served!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_050<tab>This is the kind of thing families do, Gulool Ja. We have meals together and talk about what's on our minds.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_051<tab>So you ate with your father?

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_052<tab>Yes, with them and my brothers. It was mostly the Head of Resolve and I doing the talking, though. Koana and the Head of Reason occasionally joined in, and Zoraal Ja...spoke when he was spoken to.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_053<tab>You said that you have two papas. Does that mean one is yours, and the other is my father's?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_054<tab>No, no, both are our father. He's what people call blessed siblings─a Mamool Ja with two heads.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_055<tab>Zoraal Ja is his trueborn child, while Koana and I were adopted and don't share the same blood.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_056<tab>But that doesn't make us any less a family. What matters is that our hearts are connected. The Head of Resolve taught me that.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_057<tab>Family...
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_058<tab>Do you have someone like that too? A person you think is family, even though you don't share the same blood.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_059<tab>That's...a good question.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>What about you?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_Q1_000_061<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_A1_000_062<tab>I do, and they're very dear to me.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_A1_000_063<tab>I'm something of a lone wolf.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_065<tab>I'd like to meet them one day.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_066<tab>You must be strong. I don't think I could be alone like that for long.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_067<tab>I-I'm sorry if I said something wrong...
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_069<tab>So, Gulool Ja. I'm hoping that we could be family, you and I.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>Won't you tell me about yourself?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_071<tab>You...really want to know about me?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_072<tab>I do. I want to know all about you. The things you love, the things you hate─anything and everything.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_073<tab>I want to know all about you too!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_074<tab>That reminds me, we were hoping to hear your story too, Otis.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_075<tab>As you wish. Be forewarned that mine is a tale that will be long in recounting.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_076<tab>It was before lightning had altered the world that I was appointed lord captain of the royal knights.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_077<tab>We're talking hundreds of years prior to the calamity, right?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_078<tab>Indeed. Earlier still than when I assumed this mechanical form─four hundred and fifty-four years ago, to be precise.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_079<tab>Then...you used to be a normal person?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_080<tab>Oh yes. I was once flesh and blood, like you, and I proudly served as a knight of Alexandria.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_081<tab>So rather than a machine that behaves like a person, you were─<var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> an actual person? How is this possible?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_082<tab>'Tis only natural that you are confused. Hear my tale to the end, and all shall become clear.

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_083<tab>The foremost duty of the royal knights was the protection of the royal family. In my time, that was Their Majesties the King and Queen, and their only child, Her Highness the Princess.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_084<tab>By then, every nation of our star was embroiled in some manner of conflict over electrope. Thus was our kingdom drawn into a war with its neighbor.

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_085<tab>That war was the catalyst for the great calamity that altered the environment. Countless countrymen lost their lives amidst the chaos, the king and queen among them.

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_086<tab>For a blessing, we were able to protect the princess, who then rose to the occasion and brought hope to her people in those trying times. So kind-hearted was our young queen that, at her behest, we even took in refugees from the enemy nation.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_087<tab>But sadly, her reign was cut short. Like many others, her body had been ravaged by lightning, and one day she collapsed and passed away...
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_088<tab>How tragic...
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_089<tab>Aye... Nary was there a citizen whose eyes remained dry, and many a moon was spent constructing a great tomb worthy of her memory.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_090<tab>Yet I clung to hope still. For while Her Majesty was on her deathbed, the kingdom's finest scientists had successfully extracted her soul.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_091<tab>Did we hear that right? <var 1A 02 /var>Extracted<var 1A 01 /var> her soul?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_092<tab>Our flesh may wither and die. But so long as we are remembered, we may live on.

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_093<tab>This age-old belief had always comforted our people. But as casualties mounted in the wake of the calamity, we sought to make it into reality through the power of electrope.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_094<tab>In time, we succeeded in developing the means to preserve the soul, and it was used to spare the queen eternal death.

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_095<tab>Yet it wasn't enough to simply prevent the soul's departure. For the ultimate goal was to recreate a person as they were in life, and this required that their memories be further extracted from their soul.

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_096<tab>It took many more years of research to make this possible, by which time I had become a grey old man. With my days numbered, I did not hesitate to volunteer myself as a test subject for the procedure.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_097<tab>So it was that I attained this vessel.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_098<tab>And by my successful rebirth, I paved the way for those who are recreated from the memories of the departed.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_099<tab>The Endless, they are called.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_100<tab>If your tale is true, then the queen that your people brought back to life...
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_Q2_000_101<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_A2_000_102<tab>It wouldn't be Sphene, would it?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_A2_000_103<tab>I think we know who it is.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_104<tab>Oho, so you know Her Majesty as well!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_105<tab>My description of her boundless kindness must have paled in comparison to what you no doubt felt in her presence.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_106<tab>I haven't met her myself, I confess. Not since assuming my current form. Wouldn't want to frighten the living daylights out of her!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_107<tab>Hahaha!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_110<tab>I have seen my queen from afar many times. But I've not the courage to approach her...
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_111<tab>This isn't out of cowardice, mind you, but rather...concern. Yes, concern that I would cause Her Majesty undue distress!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_115<tab>Otis has told me the tale before.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_120<tab>Does this mean the queen of Alexandria isn't actually a person like you and me...?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_130<tab>The Endless... So all this time, Sphene wasn't alive?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_131<tab>She lives yet she does not. 'Tis admittedly a difficult distinction to make.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_132<tab>Having inherited the memories of a departed soul, an Endless feels, thinks, and acts precisely as that person would.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_133<tab>In that sense, I believe they are alive.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_134<tab>The Alexandrians know about this, right? It can't have gone unnoticed that Sphene is perpetually youthful.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_135<tab>No one really knows about the Endless. People who wear regulators don't even think about death.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_136<tab>Everyone sees that the queen doesn't change, but they just accept it.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_GULOOLJA_000_137<tab>To them, it's just who she is.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_A1_000_001<tab>Are there Endless apart from yourselves?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_A1_000_002<tab>Are the people at Everkeep Endless too?

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_139<tab>While there should be as many Endless as those who have died, I believe they are limited in where they can exist. Queen Sphene is unique in her ability to appear before you.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_140<tab>Strictly speaking, I myself am not an Endless. They are created using memories extracted from a soul, but my entire soul was placed inside a machine.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_141<tab>Being inside a machine makes you different...how?

TEXT_KINGME109_04940_OTIS_000_142<tab>While I do not understand the finer points, my life is bound to this vessel. If it breaks down, then it would be over for me, much like a being of flesh and blood. Hardly an endless, unchanging life, I'm sure you'll agree!
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_143<tab>An endless, unchanging life... I can't help but be reminded of the Ea.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_WUKLAMAT_000_144<tab>Did Cahciua and the others know about all this?
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_145<tab>Considering their extensive intelligence gathering, I'd be surprised if they didn't.
TEXT_KINGME109_04940_ALISAIE_000_146<tab>For now, let's share what we've learned with Krile and Raha. I can't help but have misgivings about this...
